meanings.definition: The act of removing dirt or impurities from a surface.
meanings.sent1: I do the cleaning in our house every Saturday morning.
meanings.sent2: She hired a cleaning service to help with the spring cleaning.
meanings.sent3: The cleaning of the windows revealed a beautiful view outside.
meanings.sent4: Her meticulous cleaning of the kitchen made it sparkle like diamonds.
meanings.sent5: The cleaning of the old book brought out its hidden beauty.

meanings.definition: The process of making something clean.
meanings.sent1: Proper cleaning of fruits and vegetables is important for good health.
meanings.sent2: Regular cleaning of your car will keep it looking new for longer.
meanings.sent3: His idea of cleaning involved a lot of soap and water splashing around.
meanings.sent4: The cleaning of the tarnished silver revealed its original shine.
meanings.sent5: The deep cleaning of the carpet removed all traces of dirt and stains.

meanings.definition: The act of tidying or organizing a space.
meanings.sent1: After the party, the cleaning of the living room was a big task.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys cleaning her desk and arranging her stationery neatly.
meanings.sent3: The cleaning of the closet unearthed forgotten treasures.
meanings.sent4: His method of cleaning involved color-coding everything for easy access.
meanings.sent5: The cleaning of the garage made it possible to park the car inside again.
